ProductInfo.Features:
Up to one year of operation in standby mode on a battery charge
Wireless operation
Motion Activated
Water resistant
Truly the only product on the market for outside long term use
Product Specifications:
Video Input: NTSC/PAL Auto Detection
Standby-time: Up to 365 days (1 Year)
Continuous Usage: 20 hours
Record Mode: Standard, Motion, Overwrite
Max DVR resolution is 720 x 480
Min Illumination: 0.2LUX
Resolution Mode: 320x240 / 640x480 / 720x480
Frame Rate: 1,5,15,20,25,30fps
Video Format: MPEG-4 ASF file format
Picture Format: JPG
Storage: SD Card (up to 16GB SDHC)
Frame Counter Stamp: Yes
Battery Type: 3.7V 15000mA Lithium Battery
Weight: 1.2lbs
Size: 4.75"Lx3"W x 1" H
Camera Specs:
Image Sensor: 1/4" CMOS
Resolution: 480 TV lines
Angle of View: 78 degrees
Camera: Color
ProductInfo.Name: Xtremelife DVR/Battery with Camera
